Optic: Please hover over the attachments to see notes for alternative options! If you are in HTML view and cannot see the notes, scroll right to the HTML View Note Sheets!
We are in the process of updating the sheet for the huge v11.0.0 update! Stay tuned

Comments: Hyperburst is still really good! Trust me (lllÔø¢œâÔø¢) Well rounded with very low automatic recoil and high velocity
Lowest base recoil out of all assault rifles (¬∫ ‚ñ° ¬∫ l|l) High minimum damage with slow RPM, but a unique 1800 RPM initial burst every trigger pull!
Good at everything, but has very slow velocity and reload speed. If you miss the higher RPM it used to have, check out the Vikhr Suppressor SR-3M!
Extremely consistent long range performance with slow RPM and low recoil. Range reducing attachments don't hurt a lot as the weapon always four taps!
Very long range values and almost no recoil with the right setup! Comparable to the SCAR-L, trading a little base damage for fire rate
I know this loadout looks crazy, but read the notes and the alt sheet!!! One of the best ARs with excellent recoil, fire rate, and customizability o(*¬∞‚ñΩ¬∞*)o
Great minimum damage and penetration with good accuracy. 23 minimum damage allows the weapon to kill at any range with 3 limb shots and 1 headshot!
Unique RPM heating mechanic with great handling and velocity. M855 is extremely powerful up close, but fires randomly deviating/tumbling bullets
Ubiquitous meta AR- low recoil, great at doing everything. Burst grouping is extremely strong with 6.5 Grendel, check the alt sheet!!! (Ôæâ‚óï„ÉÆ‚óï)Ôæâ*. ‚úß
Does everything both the SCAR-L and AK74 can but with a tiny bit more base recoil. Extremely high base penetration and access to a 40rd magazine!
Able to three tap up close compared to the AUG A1, but has less overall ranged damage. 7.62x39mm has very powerful base stats and overall performance
Solid generalist auto in the same vein as the M16A3. Has the potential to three tap with a bonus torso multiplier, but has less friendly recoil in comparsion
High RPM with good range and moderate recoil. FAMAS G2 fires extremely fast and is one of the most powerful medium range autos in the game („Çú‚ñΩ„Çú*)
Generally power crept by the STG-44. Very high damage with similar ranges to some battle rifles! High initial kick, but good overall full-auto accuracy
Less three tap range than the AUG A2, but much lower initial kick- overall accuracy is similar to the AUG A1. .300 BLK is interesting, but outclassed
Nearly identical performance to the AUG A1. Fires slightly faster with higher penetration, but requires two headshots to three tap up close
Read the notes! Solid overall and very similar to the M16A3, firing slightly faster with less penetration and different recoil. Hollow points are strong here!
Very consistent and strong! Extremely low recoil with excellent damage and range, but slightly below average fire rate
Significantly lower initial kick, but worse three tap range (90) compared to the AK47 (118) üçåBanana Mag üçå
103: Friendlier recoil and further three tap to the AKM, lower min damage. 109: BORN TO SWAY || ACCURACY IS A F*** ||  410,757,864,530 DEAD PHANTOMS
Read the underbarrel and ammo note please (lllÔø¢œâÔø¢) Excellent performance at all ranges with high multipliers and RPM but noticeable horizontal kick
The TYPE 58 (7.62x39mm) is a direct upgrade to the AKM with better RPM and recoil! Default ammo is generally outclassed by the AK74 but has great hipfire
Blisteringly fast fire rate which somewhat makes up for the atrocious recoil (^‚àá^*) Hipfire loadouts are very powerful and technically more accurate
Lower recoil, lower damage M16A3. Read the barrel notes! You might find some gems rolling with the less conventional barrel attachments ‚îå(o^‚ñΩ^o)‚îò
Very high potential with good recoil and damage, but a below average fire rate which punishes missed shots. One of the best overall assault rifles
Fast burst DMR with a 72 stud torso kill range. Buffed during the 2024 New Years update with greatly improved muzzle velocity and optic sway!
Easy to use starter carbine with good accuracy and handling but quick damage drop off. Abnormally stable from the hip, try playing with hipfire builds!
Extremely standard automatic weapon with a few small caveats. Laserbeam accuracy and amazing handling, but strong initial vertical kick
Burst weapon with high fire rate and low base kick. Competes with the MP5K/10 burst and M16A4, has more minimum damage compared to the M4A1
Abnormally high minimum damage, extremely powerful! Similar to the AUG A1 and L85A2, having worse limb shot performance but better fire rate
Generally overshadowed by the AK74 due to its higher minimum damage, but the SCAR PDW reloads faster
Outclassed by the M4A1 with slightly worse overall parameters but negligibly better overall accuracy (with the correct loadout!)
Good mix of damage and fire rate with decent accuracy and a lot of different conversions to play around with. I like the GROZA-1 a lot personally
Very similar performance to the UMP45 with a much greater magazine size but much bouncier recoil. Hipfire loadouts are more accurate than aiming!
Strictly a burst loadout, otherwise use 9x39mm or the GROZA-1 instead! Can be terrifying at close range with its 1000 RPM burst mode and good three tap
Nearly identical performance to the M16A3- integrally suppressed with better reload speed, but worse range and accuracy. Hollow points are extremely strong!
Good fire rate and recoil with low base damage and an unusual torso multiplier. Still great overall, but very power-crept
If you miss the old AS VAL with 900 RPM, this is essentially the same thing with better medium range performance but lower minimum damage
Zero to hero thanks to the Halloween update! Extremely high maximum damage with excellent recoil and three tap range, but very very very poor velocity
A very unique battle rifle archetype with below average damage but amazing utility and recoil. Any suppressor + silent ammo goes crazy on Warehouse
Absurd combination of three tap range and fire rate with low but floaty initial kick. Easy head + limb two tap, dominates medium range
Sidegrade to the HENRY 45-70 with better RPM and mag size but lower velocity and penetration. .36 + Long barrel is a spicy but powerful sniper option
Probably the best assault rifle in the game right now: Similar performance to the M16A3 with absolutely no recoil and more RPM, but it can't be suppressed
Lots of potential on paper with crazy fire rate and headshot range, but burns through ammo quickly. Birdshot is actually really good!
Very similar to the JURY, trading the utility of a torso kill range for slightly better fire rate and magazine size. Speedloader works much better here :)
Borderline overpowered past 150 studs with crazy fast fire rate and the ability to one tap to the torso. Awkward ramp up velocity with other weird parameters
6.5 Grendel loadout, but the base gun wants other attachments- check the alt sheet! Excellent handling with a good effective range and high RPM
I wanna make the X95R work so badly o(T„ÉòTo) Good minimum damage considering its RPM, but its recoil isn't consistent enough compared to other autos
Surprisingly lightweight and terrifying at point blank with expectedly horrendous recoil and range. Reaches 14.00 walkspeed with short barrel üëÄ
There's a lot of mix-and-matching you can do here, and it's pretty fun! Outclassed by other one tap weapons, but you're not using it to be meta anyway lol
Lowest recoil in class with an amazing time-to-kill up close, but very poor range and velocity. 10mm Auto is very strong, but much different than default
Excellent overall damage and range with relatively smooth yet shaky recoil. Extremely poor velocity makes it a little difficult to use at longer ranges
One of the most potent close range weapons in the game, with excellent handling and recoil, just mind the initial kick
Excellent combination of fire rate, recoil, and penetration with low base damage. Solid performance in nearly every situation!
Check the alt sheet!!! Most "viably customizable" PDW with tons of great loadout choices. Amazing close range performance, fast damage falloff
Great auto for wallbangs with great magazine size, fire rate, and penetration on top of amazing accuracy. Do you remember March 26th, 2024?
Amazing generalist auto after the v10.2.1 update- Long three tap range with excellent handling, penetration, and overall utility. Hollows >>> Default!!
Generally overshadowed by the M4A1- Extremely low recoil with a good three tap range, but horrible velocity makes it difficult to use at longer ranges
Exceptional reload speed and hipfire stability with very fast fire rate, but rather high vertical recoil when aimed. Amazing TTK up to medium range
Good stats in every department with laserbeam accuracy and a very slow fire rate. Great performance to the head at all ranges with plenty of breakpoints
Sidegrade to the MP5 with integral suppression and slightly lower base kick, but slightly worse range and velocity
Sorta swept under the rug by the PDW rebalance update when it received heavy nerfs to velocity and recoil (lllÔø¢œâÔø¢)
A hidden gem from the PDW rebalance with absurd breakpoint ranges and recoil! Surprisingly versatile once you get adjusted to its low velocity and RPM
One of the strongest three tap to RPM ratios in the game with excellent medium range performance and significant but controllable horizontal drift
Excellent recoil with decent base damage and low fire rate. It also features a couple interesting conversions!
The best of both the MP5 and MP5SD with a bit less RPM, but super long ranges! („Éé*¬∞‚ñΩ¬∞*)
Nearly identical, if not better performance than the COLT SMG 633. Suppressed by default with pretty friendly recoil compared to the competition
Largely improved in the 2024 New Years update! Great overall performance across all three conversions with a preference for close range
A sidegrade to the P90- drops the high penetration and medium range damage for extremely high reserve ammo and even faster RPM!
Powerful punch at all ranges with excellent handling. Somehow gets blown out of the water by the 50.63 PARA and 50.00 damage wise, but handles faster
Lightning fast time-to-kill with moderate recoil and extremely poor velocity. .357 SIG is the star of the show, but it's been greatly nerfed in v11.0.0
VERY decent gun that has no reeal downside apart from velocity, gets the job done
Nearly identical to the L2A3- has the utility to one head + one limb kill up to roughly 50 studs with worse (but still extremely low) recoil
Arguably destroyed by the PDW rebalance, but the ZITTARA still has some niche usage! It has similar performance to the L22 with generally higher stats
One of the largest benefactors from the PDW rebalance with extremely long breakpoint ranges and moderate recoil. 10mm Auto is very strong, but sways a lot
Similar to the MP7- features an 80rd magazine with an accompanying fast reload speed, but horrible velocity and penetration
Very similar performance to the M17- Identical damage/range and can fire full auto with laser recoil, but no torso multiplier
Nearly overtuned performance across all conversions with abnormally high handling but pitiful velocity. If the binary firemode is hard to use, try burst!
Excellent range, damage, and recoil with no obvious disadvantages. Both conversions are very good as wellÔºàÔºæ‚àÄÔºæ‚óèÔºâ
A behemoth of stat product with an infinite three tap, long one head + one torso kill range, huge magazine size and very accurate yet rough kick
Excellent ranged performance with extremely low recoil and absurd velocity  \(*Ôø£‚ñΩÔø£*)„Éñ \(*Ôø£‚ñΩÔø£*)„Éñ
Good fire rate and penetration, very fast reload for a 100rd magazine \(*Ôø£‚ñΩÔø£*)„Éñ If this weapon still had 23 minimum damage it would probably be meta
Heavy AK12 with smoother kick but more horizontal sway: Burst is generally easier to use here. 7.62x39mm isn't crazy OP anymore (lllÔø¢œâÔø¢)
Long range auto beam weapon. Similar performance to the AN-94 with a far three tap range but much slower handling and more camera shake
Generally the "best" performing 7.62x39mm AK with moderate recoil and very high damage. Can three tap up to 139 studs!
Probably needs no introduction- One of the most annoying weapons to fight with strong parameters, but horrid and heavily RNG dependent accuracy
Won't go down with my hamr Unique RPM heating mechanic with amazing stats across the board!
Power crept by the STG-N since the christmas update. Near identical to the COLT LMG- Better overall accuracy, but lower base fire rate and magazine size
Check the alt sheet if you want a "no recoil" loadout! Been through the rework grinder so many times, lukewarm with poor ranges and high recoil
A combination of the STG-44 and SCAR-H- Long two tap range and can infinitely three tap with accurate recoil, but slow overall handling
Insane potential TTK with excellent recoil. Below average performance on paper if you don't hit headshots, but still serviceable due to its high RPM
If you miss the extreme long-range dominance of the old AUG HBAR, use this! (¬∫ ‚ñ° ¬∫ l|l) Plays like a very heavy SCAR-L with slightly slower RPM
Powerful performance at every range with good accuracy and an absurd mag size. Why does this weapon even exist?
A more polarizing version of the MG3KWS- more damage and fire rate, worse handling and recoil
Powerful starter battle rifle with horrible kick but an extremely fast TTK and very strong ranges. You'll definitely need some attachments for this weapon
Nearly unmatched close quarters presence with a fast two tap range but a small magazine. Both conversions (besides .410) are also very powerful (¬¥‚ñΩÔΩÄ)
Extremely high damage with accurate but shaky recoil. Similar performance to the HK417- slightly better CQC, slightly worse LRC
This is my gun ( ¬¥ ‚àÄ `) Weakest out of the battle rifles, but still has excellent damage performance with very low recoil and great reload speed
Very high damage and range (even for its class) with an absurd headshot multiplier and near AN-94 levels of accuracy! Automatic DMR with weird recoil
Easiest to use in class- worse than the SCAR-H on paper, but carried by its 1.7x head multiplier and very low kick
Has the ability to three-tap to the torso at any range with a lot of bounce, works excellently when tap-firing at longer ranges
Good torso kill range and handling with below average velocity. Similar to a lot of slug shotguns with (generally) better stats
Strong combination of three tap range, accuracy, and fire rate. Reloads a bit slower compared to other battle rifles
Requires a little finesse to use, but is extremely versatile! Excellent magazine and reserve size for its ammo pool with a decently far reaching two tap
Extremely reliable DMR with consistent damage performance and a high skill cap. Recoil was buffed considerably during the 2024 New Years update!
More aggressive compared to other DMRs with faster fire rate and lower recoil. Retains the ability to three tap at all ranges if you hit torso shots!
Two distinct flavors with marksman barrel: Default ammo for a 30rd SKS with 3.2k velocity, or a 230 RPM SVU with much lower velocity! Both are very good
An excellent archetype with a nearly unmatched balance of power and speed. While normally power crept by later DMRs, the SVU-A is very overtuned!
Unique automatic mode with high overall potential and a very far two tap range. Excellent performance at all ranges, but below average velocity for a DMR
After the PDW rebalance update, this is a rare case where both Armor Piercing and Hollow Point are amazing here! Play around with both flavors!
Very powerful with the new AP changes! Similar performance to the MSG90 with a lower overall stat product but much cleaner recoil
Arguably the most power crept DMR in this meta, but has some niche play with .458 SOCOM! New hollow points also work pretty great here
Hollows are extremely strong here! I hope you can click fast- extremely powerful performance at all ranges with good accuracy and crazy damage
Commanding ranged performance with high velocity, RPM, and the ability to two-tap enemies at any range. One of the best LRC weapons in the game!

Optic: Read the note to the left!!!!! Make sure to use the non black scope alt aim on all the eligible scopes!

Comments: Excellent starter sniper with rather forgiving velocity and torso kill range. I'm mixed about its buff (lllÔø¢œâÔø¢)
Check the alt sheet for a .32 ACP loadout! Not too interesting in its current state, well rounded in every aspect
Shoots surprisingly fast with an enormous magazine size, but has slightly below average velocity (Ôø£‚ñΩÔø£)" The special SUBSONIC ammo is really fun!
If you wanna turn your brain off for the day and just click on people, more power to you! But that doesn't make this weapon any less annoying (‚î¨‚î¨Ôπè‚î¨‚î¨)
Jack of all trades with two interesting ammo flavors (‚ùÅ¬¥‚ó°`‚ùÅ) .338 Norma has crazy torso damage at all ranges (96+) even if you miss headshots
A nearly direct upgrade to the INTERVENTION with additional torso kill range and velocity but slightly less RPM. Has some interesting conversions too
Doesn't have a lot of close range utility, but features great fire rate and a forgiving two tap at any range. It also has 3000 velocity again :D
BEHOLD!!! High versatility across all three of its conversions with absurd RPM, magazine size, and versatility! One of the best snipers the game has ever seen!
Slower mosin with a great torso kill range and a couple of wacky attachments! Above average at everything, besides magazine size
Very fast handling and fire rate, but demands headshots more than other snipers. .308 Win fixes that issue while still being speedy („Éæ;Ôø£‚ñΩÔø£)„Éæ
A direct upgrade to the BFG 50 with significantly better RPM and uptime. The only real downside in comparison is how much more expensive it is lmao
Read the ammo note! Medium range torso kill loadout, this has so many special attachments that just don't mesh well with each other (* Ôø£Ô∏øÔø£)
Very powerful sniper with an extremely far torso kill range! The v11.0.0 update greatly buffed this weapon's recoil, and it's no longer in a rework limbo state
Fires so fast!!! Ôºº(¬∫ ‚ñ° ¬∫ l|l)/ One of the highest skill cap weapons in the game's sandbox. If you don't have it unlocked, try out the 10/3.5mm SVDS!
The SVDS was nerfed, but this may be better! A lighter version of the M107 with much better recoil and handling, but a lower albeit still excellent torso kill
The optic you use here is actually very important, read the notes! I should do a better analysis of this weapon at some point but I think it speaks for itself
Read the notes! Excellent starter shotty with a surprisingly good effective range, extremely compatible with Flechette
Very middle of the road- reaches slightly further than the KSG 12. Did you know the M870 and KSG 12 have identical pellet spread? (Ôø£„ÉØÔø£)
Powerful, spammy shotgun with high spread but a good one tap range. DBV30-06 is very strong, albeit unorthodox and sometimes clunky
High damage, longest reach out of any conventional shotgun with Shrapnel-25. Harder to use up close due to its tight spread and slow rate of fire (‚ïπ‚ó°‚ïπ)
Extremely spammy with deceptively strong damage performance- still very strong after the Halloween spread nerf with nearly the same one tap range
Read the ammo note! Well above average at everything with a quick follow up shot. Encourages a more passive play style due to the low shell count
One of the best weapons to play aggressively with! Lightning fast TTK up close with barely any recoil, but very poor minimum damage and velocity
If for some reason you wanted to W+M1 in this game, use this! Highest spread in class, default ammo is on par with most birdshot shotties (‚à™.‚à™ )...zzz
Statistically a more forgiving MODEL 870 with double the fire rate and nearly identical range and spread
Extremely tight spread and high pellet count with a lot of powerful, unique attachments! Combat barrel is notably powerful
Impossible to beat at close range, but poor damage and quick ammo consumption. Did you know the USAS has slightly less pellet spread than the DBV12?
